thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Beilu Pharmaceutical sees Q1 2018 net profit up 0 pct to 15 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Beilu Pharmaceutical sees Q1 2018 net profit up 0 pct to 15 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - beijing beilu pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Feb 28(Reuters) - Beijing Beilu Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Sees Q1 2018 net profit to increase by 0 percent to 15 percent, or to be 26.4 million yuan to 30.4 million yuan
* Says Q1 2017 net profit was 26.4 million yuan
* Says that increased sales income and net margin as the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/sP1GwY
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
